# The ldap extension

Configure the `ldap` extension.

This extension provides support for LDAP (Lightweight Directory Access
Protocol).

## EXT_LDAP

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_LDAP_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.

## EXT_LDAP_SASL

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build ldap extension with Cyrus SASL support.
